S03n235:3: bodhisattvaḥ kila kasmiṃścidanupakruṣṭagotracāritre svadharmānuvṛttiprakāśayaśasi vinayācāraślāghini mahati brāhmaṇakule janmaparigrahaṃ cakāra |
S03n235:4: sa yathākramaṃ garbhādhānapuṃsavanasīmantonnayanajātakarmādibhiḥ kṛtasaṃskārakramo vedādhyayananimittaṃ śrutābhijanācārasampanne gurau prativasati sma |
S03n235:11: atha tasyādhyāpakaḥ sarveṣāmeva śiṣyāṇāṃ śīlaparīkṣānimittaṃ svādhyāyaviśrāmakāleṣvātmano dāridryaduḥkhānyabhīkṣṇamupavarṇayāmāsa |
S03n235:16: atha te tasya śiṣyāḥ pratodasaṃcoditā iva sadaśvā gurusnehātsamupajātasaṃvegāḥ sampannataraṃ prabhūtataraṃ ca bhaikṣamupasaṃharanti sma |
S03n235:20: asmatparikleśāmarṣibhistu bhavadbhirayameva yatno dhanāharaṇaṃ prati yuktaḥ karttuṃ syāt | kutaḥ ?
S03n235:23: śiṣyā ūcuḥ-kiṃ kariṣyāmo mandabhāgyā vayaṃ yadetāvānnaḥ śaktiprayāmaḥ | api ca
S03n235:37: āpaddharmaḥ steyamiṣṭaṃ dvijānāmāpaccāntyā niḥsvatā nāma loke |
S03n235:38: tasmād bhojyaṃ svaṃ pareṣāmaduṣṭaiḥ sarvaṃ caitad brāhmaṇānāṃ svameva ||8 ||
S03n235:39: kāmaṃ prasahyāpi dhanāni hartuṃ śaktirbhavedeva bhavadvidhānām |
S03n235:40: na tveṣa yogaḥ svayaśo hi rakṣyaṃ śūnyeṣu tasmādvyavaseyameva ||9 ||
S03n235:41: iti muktapragrahāstena te chātrāḥ paramamiti tattasya vacanamayuktamapi yuktamiva pratyaśrauṣuranyatra bodhisattvāt |
S03n235:45: atha sa teṣāmadhyāpako bodhisattvamavekṣya taṃ vidhimanabhinandantamapratikrośantaṃ niviṣṭaguṇasambhāvanastasminmahāsattve kiṃ nu khalvayamavyavasitatvānniḥsnehatayā vā mayi steyaṃ na pratipadyate,
S03n235:50: kathaṃ nu niḥsambhramadīnamānaso bhavāniti svasthavadeva tiṣṭhati ||12 ||
S03n235:56: nāsti loke raho nāma pāpaṃ karma prakurvataḥ |
S03n235:57: adṛśyāni hi paśyanti nanu bhūtāni mānuṣān ||13 ||
S03n235:60: ahaṃ punarna paśyāmi śūnyaṃ kvacana kiñcana |
S03n235:61: yatrāpyanyaṃ na paśyāmi nanvaśūnyaṃ mayaiva tat ||15 ||
S03n235:62: pareṇa yacca dṛśyeta duṣkṛtaṃ svayameva vā |
S03n235:65: rāgārpitaikāgramatiḥ svayaṃ tu pāpaṃ prakurvanniyamena vetti ||17 ||
S03n235:68: na cātra me niścayameti mānasaṃ dhanārthamevaṃ prataredbhavānapi |
S03n235:69: avetya ko nāma guṇāguṇāntaraṃ guṇopamardaṃ dhanamūlyatāṃ nayet ||18 ||
S03n235:72: vyatītya lajjāṃ na tu dharmavaiśase surendratārthe'pyupasaṃhṛtaṃ manaḥ ||19 ||
S03n235:73: atha tasyopādhyāyaḥ praharṣavismayākṣiptahṛdaya utthāyāsanātsampariṣvajyainamuvāca-sādhu sādhu putraka ! sādhu sādhu mahābrāhmaṇa ! pratirūpametatte praśamālaṅkṛtasyāsya medhāvikasya |
S03n235:82: tadevamātmalajjayaiva satpuruṣā nācāravelāṃ laṅghayantīti hrībalenāryeṇa bhavitavyam |
S03n235:83: evaṃ hrīparikhāsampanna āryaśrāvako'kuśalaṃ prajahāti kuśalaṃ ca bhāvayatītyevamādiṣu sūtreṣūpaneyam |
